remarks.format: ## Remarks An inherited class or event handler can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind> event to perform complex data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs> object, initializing the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.DataItem%2A> properties with the values of the `listItem` and `dataItem` parameters, respectively.

Docs.summary: Gets the specified data object of the list item that is being bound. This property is available only on a request where the list item is data-bound; on subsequent postbacks, it is always . This API is obsolete.
